2052.subject: ED
2052.descrlong: Practical applications of teaching theory, methodology, and pedagogy of learning. This course is co-taught by university professor(s), local classroom teachers, and specialists in the field of K-12 teaching. Content covers classroom management, lesson plans, Education Law, and instructional strategies in curriculum content areas with a special emphasis on SDAIE and ELA techniques for teaching in our diverse population. (Offered only as interest warrants.)

2084.subject: ED
2084.descrlong: (Formerly titled Teacher's Academy) Candidates for the reading certificate will demonstrate expertise with analyzing assessment data results to develop and administer an effective and appropriate intervention plan for beginning readers, English language learners and students with reading difficulties. (Offered as interest warrants.)
